item.title: Goodness-of-fit
item.description: Is the data agree with the model? distance between data and model predictions likelihood function: likelihood of observing the data if we assume the model; the results will be a set of fitting parameters. Why don’t we always use goodness-of-fit as a measure of the goodness of a model? overfitting not intuitive This is why we would like to balance it with parsimony using some measures of generalizability.
